executive_summary.critical_findings: Admin emails still require migration to a secure DB table for multi-tenant scalability.
top_recommendations: Implement a Cross-Encoder semantic re-ranker (FlashRank) for top 5 precision filtering.
Migrate in-memory maps in rate-limiter.ts and embedding-cache.ts to Redis (Upstash) for serverless persistence.
Finalize the 'Teacher Progress' automated dashboard for institutional reporting.

concerns: None. Lib directory cleaned of deprecated nodes.
structure_analysis.access_patterns: High-efficiency RAG pattern with vector caching active.

retrieval_quality.strengths: Metadata-aware hybrid search v3 with SLO boosting.
retrieval_quality.weaknesses: Retrieval pool is large (25); context window would benefit from a re-ranker.
